1370: Ermerut moved to Die lange straet3.E.13 after marriage.
Got married to Ghiselijn at age 16 in 1370.
Gave birth to Ermerut in 1370 at age 16.
1372: Gave birth to Sywi in 1372 at age 18.
1373: Gave birth to Eelbout in 1373 at age 19.
Lost son Eelbout when Eelbout was 1 years old.
1374: Lost daughter Sywi when Sywi was 3 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Agnes in 1378 at age 24.
1382: Lost daughter Agnes when Agnes was 5 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
